p: There was a significant difference ( p < 0.05) for mosquito species richness across habitat types. The highest richness was found in the peri-urban area (S = 30, Chao1 = 121 ± 50.63, ACE = 51.97 ± 3.88), while the lowest richness was found in the urban area (S = 11, Chao1 = 11 ± 0.48, ACE = 11.33 ± 1.57) ( Table 2).
